name: onEquip
onEquiparmor
onArmorequip
description:
When the item is equipped as an armor piece

| [Implemented Placeholders](Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.equip-slot>`       |
| `<skill.var.equip-item>`       |

name: onUnequip
onUnequiparmor
onArmorunequip
description:
When the item is unequipped as an armor piece

| [Implemented Placeholders](Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.equip-slot>`       |
| `<skill.var.equip-item>`       |

name: onAttack
onHit
description:
Executes the skill when the mob attacks an entity.
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that was attacked

| [Implemented Placeholders](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.damage-amount>`    |
| `<skill.var.damage-type>`      |
| `<skill.var.damage-cause>`     |

name: onBlock_Break
onBlockbreak
onBreakblock
onBreak_Block
description:
When the player breaks a custom block or a furniture


| [Implemented Placeholders](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/mythiccrucible/-/wikis/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.block-internalid>` |

name: onBlock_Place
onBlockplace
onPlaceblock
onPlace_Block
description:
When the player places the custom block or a furniture


| [Implemented Placeholders](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/mythiccrucible/-/wikis/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.block-internalid>` |

name: onBow_Hit
onBowhit
onArrowhit
description:
Executes a skill when the mob's projectile hits an entity.

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that has been hit

| [Implemented Placeholders](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.damage-amount>`    |
| `<skill.var.damage-type>`      |
| `<skill.var.damage-cause>`     |

name: onBreed
description:
Executes the skill when the mob breeds with another mob.

> This trigger has [`@Father`](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Father) and [`@Mother`](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Mother) targeters.

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the player that made the caster breed

name: onBucket
onUsebucket
onFillbucket
onBucketfill
onMilk
onMilked
description:
Executes the skill when the cow is milked or when an entity is stored in a bucket (axolotl and the other bucketable ones).  
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the caster itself

name: onChange_World
onChangeworld
onWorld_Change
onWorldchange
description: Executes the skill when the caster changes world.

name: onCombat
description:
The default trigger if none was used.  
Will execute when these events occurs:
- The mob deals damage
- The mob takes damage
- The mob spawns
- The mob dies

name: onConsume
onEat
description: Triggered when the item is eaten

name: onCreeper_Charge
onCreepercharge
onCharge
onCharged
description:
Executes the skill when the casting creeper is charged.  

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the caster itself

name: onCrouch
description:
Executes the skill when the player holding or equipping the item starts to crouch
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/mythiccrucible/-/wikis/../../../MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the player itself

name: onDamaged
onHurt
description:
Executes the skill when the mob takes damage.
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that dealt the damage

| [Implemented Placeholders](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.damage-amount>`    |
| `<skill.var.damage-type>`      |
| `<skill.var.damage-cause>`     |

name: onDeath
description:
Executes the skill when the mob dies.  
If the server is a Paper one, it is possible to cancel the death event as long as the cancelevent mechanic is synched. The health that the mob has after this is based on what is specified in the `ReviveHealth` Option.  
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that killed the caster

name: onDespawned
onDespawn
description:
Executes the skill when the mob despawns.
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the caster itself

name: onDropcombat
onLeavecombat
onCombatdrop
onExitcombat
description:
Executes the skill when the mob drops combat.

> **REQUIRES [ThreatTables](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Mobs/ThreatTables) to be enabled**  

> There is no associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger)

name: onEntercombat
description:
Executes the skill when the mob enters combat.

> **REQUIRES [ThreatTables](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Mobs/ThreatTables) to be enabled**  

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that made the caster enter combat

name: onExplode
description:
Executes the skill when the mob explodes.  
`mobGriefing` gamerule must be set to true for this to work.  
Generally, this trigger only works with creepers and TNTs since they are the only mobs to actually explode  
> There is no associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger)

name: onFish
onFishing
onFishingcast
description: When a player holding or equipping the item is fishing, ie casting the line out

name: onFish_Bite
onFishbite
onFishing_Bite
onFishingbite
description: Executed when, for the player holding or equipping the item, there is a bite on the hook and it is ready to be reeled in

name: onFishgrab
onFishinggrab
onFishentity
onFishingentity
description: When a player holding or equipping the item has successfully caught an entity

name: onFishcatch
onFishcaught
onFishingcatch
onFishingcaught
onCatchfish
onCaughtfish
description: When a player holding or equipping the item has successfully caught a fish and is reeling it in.

name: onFish_Fail
onFishfail
onFishingfail
description: When a player holding or equipping the item fails to catch a bite while fishing usually due to poor timing

name: onFish_Ground
onFishingground
onFishground
description: When a bobber casted by a player holding or equipping the item is stuck in the ground

name: onFish_Reel
onFishingreel
onFishreel
description: When a player holding or equipping the item reels in their hook without receiving any bites

name: onHear
onVibration
description:
Executes the skill when the mob hears a sound, [if this feature has been enabled](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Mobs/Mobs#hearing).  
The `<skill.var.volume>` [placeholder](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders) can be used in the triggered skill to return a float value between 1 and 15 representing the distance from the sound source

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that generated the sound  

> The associated [@origin](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Origin) is the location where the sound was generated  

| [Implemented Placeholders](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.volume>`           |
| `<skill.var.sound-type>`       |

name: onInteract
description:
Executes the skill when a player interacts with, or *right-clicks*, the mob.  
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the player that interacted with the caster

name: onItem_Drop
onItemdrop
onDropitem
onDrop_Item
description: When the player drops an item

name: onItem_Pickup
onItempickup
onPickupitem
onPickup_Item
description: When the player picks up an item.

name: onJoin
description: Executes the skill when the player holding or equipping the item joins the server

name: onJump
description:
Executes the skill when the player holding or equipping the item jumps

> **This is a [Paper-Only](https://papermc.io/downloads/all) mechanic!**


<!-- LINKS -->


<!--TAGS-->
<!--tag:Paper-Only-->

name: onKill
description: Executes the skill when the player holding or equipping the item kills another entity

name: onKillplayer
onPlayerkill
description:
Executes the skill when the mob kills a player.  
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the player that has been killed

name: onLoad
description: Executes the skill when the mob is loaded after a server restart.

name: onPress_Ctrl_Q
onPressctrlq
onPress_Ctrlq
onDropitemstack
description:
When a player presses Ctrl+Q to drop a stack of items

> **This is a [ProtocolLib-Only] trigger!**

name: onPress_F
onItemswap
onSwapitems
onPressf
description: When a player presses F to swap the item

name: onPress_Q
onPressq
description:
When a player presses Q to drop the item

> **This is a [ProtocolLib-Only] trigger!**

name: onPrime
description:
Executes the skill when the mob, must be a creeper, is primed (i.e. via the use of a flint and steel).  
  
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the caster itself

name: onProjectile_Hit
onProjectilehit
onTrident_Hit
onTridenthit
description:
Executes a skill when the mob's special projectile type (trident, snowball, wither skull, llama's spit etc) hits an entity.

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that has been hit

| [Implemented Placeholders](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.damage-amount>`    |
| `<skill.var.damage-type>`      |
| `<skill.var.damage-cause>`     |

name: onProjectile_Land
onProjectileland
onTridentland
description: Executes a skill when the mob's special projectile type (trident, snowball, wither skull, llama's spit etc) lands on the ground without hitting an entity.

name: onProjectile_Throw
onProjectilethrow
onThrow
onTrident_Throw
onThrowtrident
onTridentthrow
description:
Executes the skill when the special projectile item is thrown

> **This is a [Paper-Only](https://papermc.io/downloads/all) mechanic!**

name: onReady
onFirstspawn
description: Executes the skill when the mob is ready to spawn from a [spawner](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Spawners)

name: onRespawn
description: Executes the skill when the player holding or equipping the item respawns

name: onRightclick
description: Executes the skill when the player holding or equipping the item right-clicks

name: onShoot
onBowshoot
onShootbow
description:
Executes the skill when the mob shoots a projectile.  
For example, skeletons with bows will shoot arrows; ghasts, blazes, or ender dragon will shoot some type of fireball.  

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the caster

| [Implemented Placeholders](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Placeholders#variable-placeholders)     |
|--------------------------------|
| `<skill.var.bow-tension>`      |

name: onSignal
description:
This Trigger has a special syntax: `~onSignal:<signal>`  

Executes the skill when the mob receives a signal from the [signal](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Mechanics/Signal) mechanic.  
A signal must be alphanumeric.  

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that sent the signal

name: onSkillhit
onSkill_Damage
onSkilldamage
description:
Executes the skill when the mob deals damage to other entities via a mechanic.  

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the entity that was damaged

name: onSpawn
description:
Executes the skill when the mob spawns.  
> There is no associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger)

name: onSpawnorload
description: Executes the skill when either [~onSpawn](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Triggers/onSpawn) or [~onLoad](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Triggers/onLoad) would trigger.

name: onSplash_Potion
onPotionsplash
onSplashpotion
description: Executes the skill when the potion is splashed

name: onSwing
onLeftclick
description: Executes the skill when the player holding or equipping the item left clicks

name: onTame
description:
Executes the skill when the player tames the mob.  

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the player that tamed the mob

name: onTargetchange
onChangetarget
description:
Executes the skill when the mob changes target.

> **REQUIRES [ThreatTables](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Mobs/ThreatTables) to be enabled**

name: onTeleport
description:
Executes the skill when the mob teleports.  
> There is no associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger)

name: onTimer
description:
This Trigger has a special syntax: `~onTimer:<ticks>`  

Executes the skill every *n<sup>th</sup>* ticks. Ticks can't be zero and 20 ticks is equal to 1 second.  

This trigger does not act relatively to the mob's spawn time, but to a global clock. So, for instance, if you have `~onTimer:1000`, its first execution could be in any moment between mob spawn and 1000 ticks from it depending on the value of the global clock.

> Care must be taken when using this trigger as it can lead to server/client performance issues!
>i.e. large amounts of particle effects can cause client lag, or can kick the client from the server

> There is no associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger).

name: onTrade
description:
Executes the skill when the villager trades with a player.  

> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the player that traded with the villager

name: onUncrouch
description:
Executes the skill when the player holding or equipping the item stops to crouch
> The associated [@trigger](https://git.lumine.io/mythiccraft/mythiccrucible/-/wikis/../../../MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Targeters/Trigger) is the player itself

name: onUse
description: Executes the skill when the player holding the item right-clicks.
